title: The causes of cancer you can control - Cancer Research UK - Cancer News
author: Jess Kirby
description: Can cancer be prevented? Decades of research have shown that a person's chances of getting cancer depends on a mishmash of their genes and their environment, but also certain aspects of their lives, many of which they can control. Today saw the publication of a landmark Cancer Research UK-funded review by Professor Max Parkin, outlining the latest [...]
